trans-unit.source: Enables multiple collections and items to be displayed as a single list.
trans-unit.target: 允許以單一清單顯示多個集合和項目。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Data.CompositeCollection> can contain items such as strings, objects, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] nodes, elements, as well as other collections.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Data.CompositeCollection> 可以包含項目，例如字串、 物件、[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)]節點、 項目，以及其他集合。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> uses the data in the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CompositeCollection> to generate its content according to its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>使用中的資料<xref:System.Windows.Data.CompositeCollection>產生其內容根據其<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> objects to bind to collections, see the Binding to Collections section of the [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>物件繫結至集合時，請參閱 < 繫結至集合 區段的[資料繫結概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.CompositeCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.CompositeCollection" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.CompositeCollection" /> class that is empty and has default initial capacity.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.CompositeCollection" /> 類別的新執行個體，其為空白且具有預設的初始容量。

trans-unit.source: The number of items that the new list is initially capable of storing.
trans-unit.target: 新清單一開始可以儲存的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.CompositeCollection" /> class that is empty and has a specified initial capacity.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.CompositeCollection" /> 類別的新執行個體，這個執行個體是空白且可具有指定的初始容量。

trans-unit.source: New item to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要加入至集合中的新項目。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified item to this collection.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的項目加入至集合。

trans-unit.source: Zero-based index where the new item is added.
trans-unit.target: 加入新項目之以零起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Clears the collection.
trans-unit.target: 清除集合。

trans-unit.source: This method resets the collection to be empty.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會重設為空集合。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the collection changes, either by adding or removing an item.
trans-unit.target: 集合變更 (新增或移除項目) 時發生。

trans-unit.source: The item to check.
trans-unit.target: 要檢查的項目。

trans-unit.source: Checks to see if a given item is in this collection.
trans-unit.target: 檢查指定項目是否位於這個集合中。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the collection contains the given item; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果集合含有指定的項目則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The array that is the destination of the copy operation.
trans-unit.target: 這個陣列是複製作業的目的端。

trans-unit.source: Zero-based index in the target array at which the copying starts.
trans-unit.target: 目標陣列中以零起始的索引，位於複製開始的位置。

trans-unit.source: Makes a shallow copy of object references from this collection to the given array.
trans-unit.target: 從這個集合建立物件參考的淺層複本 (Shallow Copy) 至指定的陣列。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of items stored in this collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得儲存在此集合中的項目數。

trans-unit.source: The number of items stored in this collection.
trans-unit.target: 儲存在此集合中的項目數。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionContainer> object counts as 1 item.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionContainer>物件計數為 1 個項目。

trans-unit.source: The item to retrieve the index for.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取索引的項目。

trans-unit.source: Returns the index in this collection where the given item is found.
trans-unit.target: 傳回此集合中的索引，表示找到指定項目的位置。

trans-unit.source: If the item appears in the collection, then the zero-based index in the collection where the given item is found; otherwise, <c>-1</c>.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目出現在集合中，則為找到指定項目之集合內以零為起始的索引，否則為 <c>-1</c>。

trans-unit.source: The index to insert the item at.
trans-unit.target: 要插入項目處的索引。

trans-unit.source: The item reference to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要加入集合的項目參考。

trans-unit.source: Inserts an item in the collection at a given index.
trans-unit.target: 將項目插入至位於指定索引的集合。

trans-unit.source: All items after the given position are moved down by one.
trans-unit.target: 指定位置之後的所有項目都會下移一個位置。

trans-unit.source: If index is out of range.
trans-unit.target: 索引是否超出範圍。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based offset of the item to retrieve or replace.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取或取代的項目之以零起始的位移。

trans-unit.source: Indexer property that retrieves or replaces the item at the given zero-based offset in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 索引子屬性，擷取或取代集合中指定以零為起始之位移 (Offset) 位置的項目。

trans-unit.source: The item at the specified zero-based offset.
trans-unit.target: 位於指定之以零起始位移的項目。

trans-unit.source: If the index is out of range.
trans-unit.target: 索引是否超出範圍。

trans-unit.source: The type of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.WeakEventManager" /> calling this method.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.WeakEventManager" /> 型別。

trans-unit.source: This only recognizes manager objects of type <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.CollectionChangedEventManager" />.
trans-unit.target: 這只會辨識屬於 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.CollectionChangedEventManager" /> 型別的管理員物件。

trans-unit.source: Object that originated the event.
trans-unit.target: 發出事件的物件。

trans-unit.source: Event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Handles events from the centralized event table.
trans-unit.target: 從集中式事件資料表處理事件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the listener handled the event; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果由接聽程式處理事件，就是 <see langword="true" />，否則就是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The item to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的項目。

trans-unit.source: Removes the given item reference from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 從集合中移除指定的項目參考。

trans-unit.source: All remaining items move up by one.
trans-unit.target: 所有剩下的項目都會上移一個位置。

trans-unit.source: The index at which to remove an item.
trans-unit.target: 要移除項目處的索引。

trans-unit.source: Removes an item from the collection at the given index.
trans-unit.target: 從集合中的指定索引處移除項目。

trans-unit.source: All remaining items move up by one.
trans-unit.target: 所有剩下的項目都會上移一個位置。

trans-unit.source: If index is out of range.
trans-unit.target: 索引是否超出範圍。

trans-unit.source: This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員支援 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 基礎結構，但是您不可以從程式碼直接使用它。

trans-unit.source: true if access to the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: 如果對 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> 的存取已同步化 (安全執行緒) 則為 true，否則為 false。

trans-unit.source: This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員支援 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 基礎結構，但是您不可以從程式碼直接使用它。

trans-unit.source: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 可用以同步存取 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> 的物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator.
trans-unit.target: 傳回列舉值。

trans-unit.source: An IEnumerator object.
trans-unit.target: IEnumerator 物件。

trans-unit.source: This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員支援 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 基礎結構，但是您不可以從程式碼直接使用它。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> has a fixed size; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 有固定大小，則為 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員支援 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 基礎結構，但是您不可以從程式碼直接使用它。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> is read-only; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 是唯讀，則為 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員支援 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 基礎結構，但是您不可以從程式碼直接使用它。

trans-unit.source: The view created.
trans-unit.target: 檢視已建立。

trans-unit.source: The type of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.WeakEventManager" /> calling this method.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.WeakEventManager" /> 型別。

trans-unit.source: This only recognizes manager objects of type <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.CollectionChangedEventManager" />.
trans-unit.target: 這只會辨識屬於 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.CollectionChangedEventManager" /> 型別的管理員物件。

trans-unit.source: Object that originated the event.
trans-unit.target: 發出事件的物件。

trans-unit.source: Event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員支援 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 基礎結構，但是您不可以從程式碼直接使用它。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the listener handled the event; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果由接聽程式處理事件，就是 <see langword="true" />，否則就是 <see langword="false" />。
